descriptions:
["DescriptionExclusively for sale with Paul Martin at LuxuryProperty.com, this beautifully upgraded beachfront villa will make the perfect family home on the Palm Jumeirah. The current owner has take great care of the villa and maintained the property to a high standard.
• Upgraded Garden Home
• Garden Foyer style
• 4 Bedrooms + Maid's
• Stunning Atlantis & sea view
• BUA 5000 sq ft
• Plot 6686 sq ft
• Spacious living and dining room
• Private swimming pool
• Direct access to the beach from your garden
• Low service fees compared to other luxury areas
As you enter the main foyer, the hallway leads through to the living room and open plan kitchen and dining area. The kitchen enjoys plenty of natural light due to the wall having been removed between this area and the dining room. An island kitchen has been installed as part of the upgrade and improvements to this room. The maid’s room and laundry area are situated opposite the kitchen, while the garage can be accessed from the hallway.
There are 4 bedrooms in total and all of them are located on the first floor. Each room has built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom. There is a large terrace accessible from the front side bedroom which overlooks the community towards the Dubai Marina skyline. The master bedroom has its own private balcony with sunset views towards the Atlantis Hotel.
The swimming pool is positioned at the side of the villa, while a shaded sitting area can be found at the back of the garden.
For the discerning client, this is a beautiful beachfront family home well worth taking the time to view."]

["DescriptionA prestigious residential tower, Il Primo consists of large apartments, some occupying the full Floor. Rising 77 storeys, the marvelous residential complex comprises 119 units. The interiors of Il Primo are tastefully designed and crafted, with marble features, sleek wooden elements, and modern pieces, the interiors exude refined elegance.
- Smart home integration, audio visual integration with the fountains and online groceries
- Benefits from value added services like concierge and valet services
- Also offers an indoor golf simulator, games room, a library, movie theatre and play areas
- Facilities include multi-purpose halls, meeting facilities, business lounges and a cigar lounge
- Access to indoor and outdoor swimming pools
- Wide range of lifestyle, sporting, and leisure amenities
- Diverse entertainments and events throughout the year
- Pedestrianized streets with a waterfront promenade and a variety of retail options
DON'T MISS THIS OFFER !!
- half floor penthouse 
- direct next to Opera Dubai
- incredible view of Burj Khalifa and Fountain 
- 25% till handover
- 75% post handover payment plan for 5 years 
- only 10% downpayment 
- handover August 2021 
For more details please contact our team right now!"]
